header.name: Authorization
header.description: The HTTP header containing credentials to authenticate and authorize the API request.

header.name: X-API-Key
header.description: The API key provided in the request header for authenticating access to the endpoint.

path.name: jobId
path.description: The unique identifier of the job, used to retrieve its status and results.

body.name: job
body.description: Object containing comprehensive information about the job, including status and parameters

items.name: id
items.description: A unique identifier associated with various entities or subcomponents within the job response.

items.name: type
items.description: The category or classification type of the job or data being processed.

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the job, such as pending, running, completed, or failed.

items.name: policyId
items.description: The unique identifier of the policy or rule set applied during the job evaluation.

items.name: input
items.description: The original data or payload submitted for processing in the job.

items.name: progress
items.description: A numeric indicator reflecting the percentage of job completion.

items.name: percent
items.description: The progress value expressed as a percentage, indicating completion status.

items.name: stage
items.description: The current phase or step within the job’s processing lifecycle.

items.name: etaSeconds
items.description: The estimated time in seconds remaining until job completion.

items.name: result
items.description: Final result or output data produced by the completed job

items.name: summary
items.description: A concise overview of the job results or key findings after processing completion.

items.name: decision
items.description: The final outcome of the job indicating approval, rejection, or review required based on the evaluated data.

items.name: maxScore
items.description: The highest possible score attainable for the evaluated criteria within the job.

items.name: flaggedCategories
items.description: A list of categories identified during processing that triggered warnings or require further attention.
Index or key representing the first element in a list or array within the response, typically used for ordered data referencing.

items.name: scores
items.description: A detailed breakdown of numerical scores assigned to different evaluation criteria within the job.
Index or key representing the first element in a list or array within the response, typically used for ordered data referencing.

items.name: category
items.description: The classification assigned to the input data based on evaluation criteria.

items.name: score
items.description: The overall numerical value indicating the result or quality of the job’s evaluation.

items.name: threshold
items.description: The minimum score or value required to trigger a specific decision or classification.

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the job, such as pending, running, completed, or failed.

items.name: findings
items.description: Array or object containing detailed analysis results or observations extracted from the job.
Reserved or placeholder parameter, typically representing the first element in an indexed collection.

items.name: type
items.description: The category or classification type of the job or data being processed.

items.name: message
items.description: A descriptive text providing additional information or context about the job status or results.

items.name: confidence
items.description: A numerical value representing the system’s certainty level regarding the decision made.

items.name: timestamp
items.description: The ISO 8601 formatted date and time marking a specific event related to the job.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The timestamp in milliseconds marking when the job processing began.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The timestamp in milliseconds marking when the job processing ended.

items.name: region
items.description: Object defining a specific area or segment within an image, video frame, or document.

items.name: x
items.description: A generic placeholder parameter often representing a coordinate, index, or auxiliary data depending on context.

items.name: y
items.description: Vertical coordinate of a bounding box or region of interest, expressed in pixels.

items.name: w
items.description: Width dimension of a bounding box or region of interest, expressed in pixels.

items.name: h
items.description: Height dimension of a bounding box or region of interest, expressed in pixels.

items.name: frameIndex
items.description: Zero-based index indicating the position of a frame within a video sequence.

items.name: textSpan
items.description: Object defining the start and end positions of a specific text segment within a larger transcript.

items.name: start
items.description: Timestamp marking the beginning of the event or segment, represented as an ISO 8601 formatted string.

items.name: end
items.description: Timestamp marking the end of the event or segment, represented as an ISO 8601 formatted string.

items.name: snippet
items.description: Short excerpt or portion of text or audio extracted for review or analysis.

items.name: labels
items.description: Array of descriptive tags or categories assigned to a segment or finding.
Reserved or placeholder parameter, typically representing the first element in an indexed collection.

items.name: transcript
items.description: Full text transcription of an audio or video recording processed by the job.
Reserved or placeholder parameter, typically representing the first element in an indexed collection.

items.name: startMs
items.description: Start time of an event or segment expressed as milliseconds elapsed from the beginning of the media.

items.name: endMs
items.description: End time of an event or segment expressed as milliseconds elapsed from the beginning of the media.

items.name: text
items.description: Text content associated with a given segment, label, or result.

items.name: speaker
items.description: Identifier or label denoting the speaker associated with a segment of audio or transcript.

items.name: words
items.description: Array of word objects representing individual tokens recognized within the transcript.
Reserved or placeholder parameter, typically representing the first element in an indexed collection.

items.name: startMs
items.description: Start time of an event or segment expressed as milliseconds elapsed from the beginning of the media.

items.name: endMs
items.description: End time of an event or segment expressed as milliseconds elapsed from the beginning of the media.

items.name: word
items.description: Single recognized word or token extracted from the transcript.

items.name: confidence
items.description: Numerical score representing the confidence level of the result, typically ranging from 0 to 1.

items.name: outputFiles
items.description: List of files generated as a result of the job execution
Reserved for internal use or indexing, representing the first element in an array response

items.name: id
items.description: Unique identifier for the job, resource, or individual element within the response.

items.name: status
items.description: Indicates the current state of the job. Possible values include "pending," "in_progress," "completed," or "failed."

items.name: purpose
items.description: Describes the intended use or role of the returned data or specific segment.

items.name: filename
items.description: Name of the file associated with the job or resource, including file extension.

items.name: mimeType
items.description: MIME type indicating the format of the associated file or media content.

items.name: sizeBytes
items.description: The size of the job output file in bytes

items.name: checksumSha256
items.description: SHA-256 checksum of the job output, used to verify data integrity

items.name: storage
items.description: Storage details including type and location for the job output files

items.name: provider
items.description: Identifier for the service provider or system responsible for processing the job

items.name: bucket
items.description: Name of the storage bucket where the job output is saved

items.name: key
items.description: Unique identifier for the job or resource within the storage system

items.name: region
items.description: Geographic region where the job is being processed or the data is stored

items.name: createdAt
items.description: Timestamp when the job was initially created, in ISO 8601 format

items.name: expiresAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating when the job results or output will expire and no longer be accessible

items.name: metadata
items.description: User-defined key-value pairs providing custom information related to the job

items.name: reportUrl
items.description: URL to access a detailed report or summary of the job results

items.name: error
items.description: Object containing error information if the job failed, including code and description

items.name: code
items.description: Status code representing the current state or outcome of the job

items.name: message
items.description: Human-readable message providing additional context about the job status

items.name: retriable
items.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the job can be retried in case of failure

items.name: createdAt
items.description: Timestamp when the job was initially created, in ISO 8601 format

items.name: updatedAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the job status or results were updated, in ISO 8601 format

items.name: meta
items.description: Additional metadata associated with the job, providing supplemental context or information

body.name: error
body.description: Object containing error information if the job failed, including code and description

items.name: code
items.description: Status code representing the current state or outcome of the job

items.name: message
items.description: Human-readable message providing additional context about the job status

items.name: details
items.description: Detailed description or additional information about the job status or error

items.name: requestId
items.description: Server-generated unique identifier for the request, useful for tracking and support inquiries

body.name: error
body.description: Details of any error encountered while processing the request. This field is present only if the request failed.

items.name: code
items.description: Status code representing the current state or outcome of the job

items.name: message
items.description: Human-readable message providing additional context about the job status

items.name: details
items.description: Detailed description or additional information about the job status or error

items.name: requestId
items.description: Unique identifier for the request, generated by the server. Use this ID when contacting support for troubleshooting.
